column4: ok, now I need a radio stream player, and a video player, as totem isn't playing any of my flix..
anyone?
have you tried mplayer?
as long as you have the codecs, the repos should have it
exactly what bimberi said, do you really think I spend the type and spell your name out in full special capitalization? :P
i'm much too lazy for that
LMAO..  yeah I hear ya..
I almost *never* type in a person's name in full, two to three leters suffices
so where do I find the repos??
ok, lets say that Im a total n00b to all this..  (cause I am) :p and I have no clue on how to get stuff from the repos. unless it's in the drop down (start) menu...
yeah, I got those..  but ummm  I dunno what to do with em..
you ran an update in apt-get or uncertainty?
I ran aop get in Terminal..
``apt-get update'' ?
ummmm  what u talkin about??  I did the update on the wizard thingy..
oh, great
now try search for mplayer
ummmm where?
in synaptic/kynaptic/apt-get (pick one of those that applies)
ahh  you mean the app installer thingy??
ok, did a search, nothin..  it's not there..
